segments.text: Most of our customers are foreigners . How many foreign languages can you speak , Elizabeth ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And how well can you speak them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , French was my best subject at school . I can read and write it pretty well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it's not as good as my French . I can speak it reasonably well , but my written Spanish isn't very good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Well , we have a lot of Spanish customers , but you wouldn't need to write any Spanish here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , I'm fit for the position I think .
segments.speaker: S2
